channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Assume lack of context

item.title: Danish Designed Enkl ES2 Bluetooth Speaker Keeps Things Green And Simple
item.description: This portable Bluetooth speaker from Denmark offers 80W of output and can play for up to 24 hours a single charge of its built-in battery.

item.title: In Photos: Jupiter And Its Fiery Moon Io In Close-Ups From NASA’s Juno
item.description: See the latest spectacular images just sent back from the Jovian System by NASA's solar-powered spacecraft, Juno.

item.title: The Western Union trap
item.description: When the telephone began to gain traction, the monopoly of the time, Western Union, decided to get even better at sending telegrams.
